description: Track any exchange rate according to the European Central Bank and provided by exchangeratesapi.io.
helpText: Specify three-letter codes for the currencies you want to track the exchange rate for. Supported currencies are USD, EUR, JPY, GBP, AUD, CAD, CHF, HKD, NZD, ISK, PHP, DKK, HUF, CZK, RON, SEK, IDR, INR, BRL, RUB, HRK, THB, MYR, BGN, TRY, CNY, NOK, ZAR, MXN, SGD, ILS, KRW, PLN.
